content: {A害羞冒烟}I've been digging around, so I might look a lickle dirty, but it's just part of growing sproutsies, y'know? I'll make sure to clean up properly.
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A摇头}Oh, no, I didn't actually eat anything on the roof! I did have a taste... but that's not what I meant!
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: When in doubt, ask The Skies Above! {A伸懒腰}O' great skies and seas, I ask thee... <style=SizeSmall>What crops should I plant?</style>
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: <style=SizeSmall>...This flavor... wonder if it'd be good for growin' rice?</style> {A云果双手举高}Yeeek! Y-You scared me... Oh, it's you. I-I didn't see you there.
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, well mah... It's, it's just that <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> is waiting for you at the Camp!
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: My eyes and nose ain't all that sharp. {A笑眯眯}Maybe The Skies Above wanted to make it up to me this way.
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A歪头}How come I can taste the soil even from far away? I was just born this way.
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}<style=SizeSmall>Okey dokey!</style> The Skies Above say, "plant everything"!
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I just took a little stroll around our Grasstop Grotto. Well mah, it tastes super nourishing. That must be why the flowers and plants on the roof are thriving.
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I was just tastin' and sniffin' the air, checkin' the smell and humidity to figure out {A笑眯眯}what'll grow best here. It's... my little secret~!
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I'm tastin' the air to decide what to plant besides tomatoes. Rice, snowy cantaloupes... Whew-ee, so many choices! Maybe I'll just let The Skies Above decide mah~!
info: 莫白聚餐-云果闲聊_主流程文本II
